meanings.sent1: The battlewagons sailed across the ocean, ready for any enemy.
meanings.sent2: The navy deployed their battlewagons to protect the coastline.
meanings.sent3: The battlewagons looked majestic as they glided through the water.
meanings.sent4: The battlewagons stood like mighty guardians of the sea.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the battlewagons struck fear into the hearts of their foes.

meanings.definition: a group of military vehicles equipped for combat
meanings.sent1: The army convoy consisted of several battlewagons rolling through the desert.
meanings.sent2: The battlewagons lined up in formation before the battle began.
meanings.sent3: The soldiers joked about racing the battlewagons in the training ground.
meanings.sent4: The battlewagons moved like a pack of armored beasts on the battlefield.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the battlewagons rumbling echoed through the valley.

meanings.definition: to engage in a fierce confrontation or struggle
meanings.sent1: The two rival gangs decided to battlewagons for control of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The knights battlewagons against the dragon to protect the kingdom.
meanings.sent3: The siblings battlewagons over who gets the last cookie in the jar.
meanings.sent4: The political parties battlewagons for votes in the upcoming election.
meanings.sent5: The athletes battlewagons for the championship title with great determination.
